text: Map of Lydia around 50 CE, showing the town under the name Charakipolis. Charax (), or Charakipolis, was a town of ancient Lydia, inhabited during Roman times. Its site is located near Karayakup in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Lydia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Manisa Province Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Charax (Lydia)
